description: rectangular shape with wedge cutout at top center; head of mustached man wearing hat in wedge; poem on front and back; pennies on short sides; orange-yellow body
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on each long side, in black: [Place a coin on Old Tip\'s hat, / He will show you what to do, / He puts it in on either side, / And saves your money too.]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [\"OLD TIP\" / 78150 O.C. Tin / English 1900?]
title: "Old Tip" mechanical bank
